title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can successfully log in with valid credentials and maintain session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click on login button
Check user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard
Refresh the page or reopen the app
Verify session persistence and user remains logged in

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify the login fails and shows appropriate error message when using invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email and/or password
Click on login button
Check that login is rejected with a clear error message

title: Sign Up Flow Success
description: Verify new users can register successfully providing valid data and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to sign up page
Input valid user details (email, password, etc.)
Submit the sign up form
Confirm account creation and automatic login or confirmation message

title: Role and Plan Based Access Control
description: Verify users can only access features and sub-agents permitted by their account plan.

steps.description: Log in with a user subscribed to Free plan
Attempt to access Business and Premium-only features and sub-agents
Verify access is denied or features are hidden
Log in with a user subscribed to Basic plan
Verify access to Basic and Free features
Try to access Business/Premium restricted features
Verify these are blocked or inaccessible
Log in with Business and Premium users and verify access to all claimed features including prioritized support and backups

title: Row Level Security (RLS) Enforcement
description: Validate that Row Level Security policies prevent users from accessing data of other users.

steps.description: Log in with User A and create financial records and calendar events
Log out User A and log in with User B
Try to access or manipulate User A's data via UI or API
Confirm data of User A is not accessible or modifiable by User B

title: Financial Management Workflow
description: Test adding, editing, deleting, categorizing financial entries and export functions with respective plan permissions.

steps.description: Log in with a user who has financial management enabled
Create financial entries for income and expenses with different categories
Verify the entries appear correctly and are categorized properly
Edit existing financial entries and save changes
Confirm updates are saved and reflected in the dashboard
Delete a financial entry
Verify the entry is removed from the list and dashboard metrics update
Export financial records in CSV and PDF formats
Check the exported files contain correct, up-to-date data
Log in with a user from Free plan and attempt financial operations restricted
Verify that restricted operations are blocked and proper messages or UI states are shown

title: Tasks Management with Drag-and-Drop
description: Verify that tasks can be created, updated (including priority/status), reordered with drag-and-drop, and filtered correctly.

steps.description: Open tasks module after login
Create a new task with all required fields and priority
Confirm task appears in list with correct details
Change status of task (e.g., to completed)
Verify status update is saved and reflected visually
Reorder tasks with drag-and-drop interaction
Confirm order changes persist and update across views
Use filters to view tasks by priority and status
Verify correct filtered results are displayed

title: Calendar and Event Scheduling Features
description: Test creation, editing, deletion, and reminders of calendar events and invitations including Google Calendar synchronization where enabled.

steps.description: Open calendar/agenda view after login
Create a new event with title, date/time, participants, and reminders
Confirm event appears correctly in day, week, and month views
Edit the event details, including changing time and participant list
Verify event updates persist and reflect in all calendar views
Delete the event and confirm removal
Ensure event no longer appears in calendar
For a user with Google Workspace integration enabled, verify event synchronization to Google Calendar
Confirm event appears accurately on Google Calendar and updates sync bi-directionally

title: Interactions with IA Agents on WhatsApp
description: Verify that AI sub-agents respond correctly to typical interactions via WhatsApp Business including financial entries, lead qualification, marketing automation and video creation.

steps.description: Send a financial record message via WhatsApp to the finance AI agent
Verify agent parses and stores the financial data correctly in the app
Send lead information to the SDR agent via WhatsApp
Confirm lead is qualified and recorded properly
Trigger marketing campaign creation via WhatsApp with the marketing agent
Verify campaign is generated and logged appropriately
Request video creation via WhatsApp to video AI agent
Check that video is generated and user gets confirmation
Test premium sub-agent features via WhatsApp for eligible plans
Confirm premium agent responses according to specifications

title: Dashboard Metrics, Reports and Exports
description: Verify that dashboard displays correct metrics and charts, and that users can export reports successfully.

steps.description: Access the dashboard after logging in
Verify financial summaries, goal progress, and upcoming bills metrics are shown correctly
Open reports section and generate a report
Confirm the report displays accurate insights and data visualizations
Export the report in available formats (PDF, CSV)
Verify exported files contain the correct data and formatting

title: Notifications System Functionality
description: Verify system delivers real-time notifications correctly and supports ticket and FAQ interactions.

steps.description: Trigger an action that generates a notification (e.g., new support ticket creation)
Verify notification is received in real-time and displayed in notification dropdown
Open notifications panel and mark notifications as read
Confirm notifications update their read status correctly
Access support ticket system and submit a new ticket
Verify ticket is recorded and user receives confirmation notification
Browse FAQ and search for specific help topics
Confirm FAQ content is relevant and search returns expected results

title: User Profile Management and Theme Switching
description: Verify users can update profile information, upload avatar, and toggle between light and dark themes with persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile page after login
Update profile details such as name, email, and save changes
Verify details are updated and persist after refreshing
Upload a new avatar image and save
Confirm avatar image changes and displays properly
Toggle theme switch from light to dark and back
Check UI updates accordingly and preference persists on reload

title: Backups and Data Restoration for Premium Plan
description: Verify that daily off-site backups are created for Premium plan users and that data restoration is possible.

steps.description: Log in with a Premium plan user account
Verify daily backups are created and metadata shows latest backup timestamp
Simulate data loss or deletion
Trigger data restoration from latest backup
Confirm restoration completes successfully and data is fully recovered

title: Security, Privacy and LGPD Compliance
description: Validate implementation of privacy policies, user consent (opt-in/opt-out), and LGPD compliance features.

steps.description: Access privacy settings section
Check presence of LGPD consent forms and policy documentation
Confirm user can opt-in and opt-out explicitly
Attempt to access data processing features without user consent
Verify restricted access and user informed about missing consent

title: Responsive Layout and UI Components Validation
description: Verify sidebar, header, and content layout adapt correctly across different screen sizes and theme modes.

steps.description: Access application on desktop screen
Verify sidebar, header, and main content are properly displayed and accessible
Resize browser window to tablet and mobile viewport sizes
Confirm layout switches to responsive mode with usable navigation and content
Toggle between light and dark themes
Check UI components and colors adapt correctly to theme

title: Automated Playwright Tests Coverage Verification
description: Ensure critical flows and deep navigation are covered by Playwright automated tests and run successfully.

steps.description: Run Playwright test suite for critical functionality
Verify all tests pass without failures
Run Playwright deep navigation analysis test
Confirm deep navigation flows execute successfully
Run financial management standardization tests
Ensure financial feature tests are successful and data integrity is maintained
